Title: Object: Le fumeur égyptien
Description: Egyptian man seen half-length, facing front, smoking a long pipe Etching on chine collé
Producer name: Print made by: Jean Léon Gérôme
Curator's comments: Plate later published in 'La Gazette des Beaux-Arts', 1868, opposite p. 148. Another impression: 1870,0709.171.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (3)
Beraldi 1885-92 / Les Graveurs du dix-neuvième siècle (1)
